ValidationRule.description: If Correction Details field is populated Correction Date cannot be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: No_Errors_Found__c == FALSE && Flow_Validation_Rule_Bypass_Check__c = FALSE && AND( ISBLANK( Corrected_Date__c ) , NOT( ISBLANK( Corrected_Detail__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have filled out the Corrected Detail, please also provide the Corrected Date before saving the record.
